entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts. He is described as snapping at Harry and standing glaring until Harry had passed out of sight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as not going back to the common room and instead thinking of visiting the Owlery.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl. She is mentioned as being in the Owlery.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a professor at Hogwarts. He is described as looking around his office door and speaking to Harry in a different voice from Filch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being in Hogsmeade with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as being in Hogsmeade with Ron.

relationships.description: Filch scolds Harry for not going back to the common room.
Lupin speaks to Harry in his office.
